name: d3-selection-multi
description: Multi-value map syntax for D3 selections.

scripts.prepublish: npm run test && d3-bundler -n selectionMulti -o build/selection-multi.js && uglifyjs build/selection-multi.js -c -m -o build/selection-multi.min.js && rm -f build/selection-multi.zip && zip -j build/selection-multi.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/selection-multi.js build/selection-multi.min.js
